story_alola_02_01000/2401_1101_0100_20:
At around the same time the Aether Foundation
employees were rebelling against Lusamine...
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Hey! Why are people from the Aether Foundation
trying to steal Pokémon?!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: Isn’t it your job to protect them?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Starting today, the Aether Foundation has teamed
up with Team Rocket!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
WE control the Aether Foundation! The sheltered
Pokémon belong to US!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_0800_10: How cowardly of you to attack us off guard!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_1000_10: We’ll use your Pokémon to benefit US!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_1100_10: We won’t allow it! Go! Palossand!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
We won’t let you reel us in like that!
Go, Araquanid!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
You’ve been fighting a long time since you were
ambushed!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Anyone can win against a tired Pokémon! In fact,
that’s our strategy!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_2200_10: And that other one is Tapu Bulu!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_2300_10: What are the Alolan guardian deities doing here?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: It seems they’re doing what they want...
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
But our opponents are confused! Now’s
our chance!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3100_10: Whoa! Wh-why are they attacking me?!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: HEY! Stop it, Tapu Bulu! That’s enough!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3500_10:
What? S-stop, that’s dangerous! Now Tapu Bulu
is looking at US!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3600_10:
I don’t know why you’re angry...but Sophocles
isn’t the enemy!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Don’t take your frustration out on us! If you’re a
guardian deity, then you should be protecting the
Pokémon and people on Pasio, who’re in trouble!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You managed to calm Tapu Bulu... How could
this happen?!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Does that mean Acerola earned Tapu Bulu’s
approval?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Acerola’s shouts and their will to protect Pasio
may have lit a fire in Tapu Bulu’s heart!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: I...I don’t even know what to say!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_4400_10: Hmm... Now’s the time to reel it in!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: Oh, look! There’s Lusamine and Giovanni!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5200_10: Oh? You interested in playing jokes, too?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5300_10: If so...then I have a favor to ask.
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5400_10:
Could you lend me your strength, even for a little
while, to protect this island of Pasio?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5500_10: I’ll teach you all my little tricks after that.
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5600_10: What?! That shine! You too, Lana?
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5700_10:
Amazing how the both of you managed to connect
with guardian deities!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5800_10: Didn’t expect that! In a good way!
story_alola_02_01000/2401_1001_5900_10: Thank you very much, Tapu Lele.
